original_text: Everything that I promised in the past has happened as I said that it would happen. Now I will tell you about new things. Before they start to happen, I will tell you about them.’ Everything that I promised in the past has happened
korean_text: 보라 전에 예언한 일이 이미 이루어졌느니라 이제 내가 새 일을 알리노라 그 일이 시작되기 전에라도 너희에게 이르노라

sentences.original_text: Everything that I promised in the past
has happened as I said that it would happen
Now I will tell you about new things
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 너에게 새로운 것들을 말하겠다

sentences.original_text: I will tell you about them
Everything that I promised in the past
